attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIFIC

attributes.review: you guys may know that I‚Äôm an open minded person. well, being open minded I decided to download the app to see what all this hype was about. well, that‚Äôs the part where everything went downhill. you see, when I first opened the app I started to hear a weird noise coming from my attic. and you might be wondering, how does that have anything to do with this app? Well, turns out there was a large group of sexually active iguanas in the attic all decked out in MAGA gear. I mean, why of all animals would you choose an iguana?! and to add to that, my cat started speaking a foreign language which sounded kind of like Russian but who knows? I was then called by an unknown number which I assumed was part of this whole app dilemma, and the caller stated that if I didn‚Äôt vote for trump that a group of uncircumcised snails would bite off little holes in my underwear which is really weird because I never specified that I had a urinating issue (I pee whenever I see Turkish food). And that‚Äôs not even all!! The snails did leave eventually but they left behind little pieces of paper with letters on them which I assumed to be part of a puzzle of sorts. I spent DAYS trying to figure out all the words you could make with these letters. How odd! I couldn‚Äôt figure any words out! Then I remembered something!! The snails left a hint underneath my toothbrush that said ‚Äúthere are no words, we just simply enjoy wasting your time -trump administration.‚Äù HOW DID I NOT NOTICE THE CONNECTION?! I mean, I came with low expectations at the start but now that I think about it, maybe I should have expected less from a man who sexualises minors and makes racist comments more often than a white mom visits her local Facebook page about different flavors of abdominal pain. Silly me üòîü§£ü§£üòπüòπ. Oh yeah, I give this app a single star because it won‚Äôt allow me to make it lower (which I would if possible).
